name: Quiver.WeaklyConnectedComponent.eq
initialProofState:
V : Type u_1
inst✝ : Quiver V
a b : V
⊢ Iff (Eq (Quiver.WeaklyConnectedComponent.mk a) (Quiver.WeaklyConnectedComponent.mk b)) (Nonempty (Quiver.Path a b))
decl:
protected theorem eq (a b : V) :
    (a : WeaklyConnectedComponent V) = b ↔ Nonempty (@Path (Symmetrify V) _ a b) :=
  Quotient.eq''
